unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film fests are buzzing again, folks!
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film fests are buzzing again, folks!

unnormalised: The entertainment scene is absolutely exploding with film festivals happening across India and globally. Forget Netflix and chill (for a weekend, anyway!).
normalised: The entertainment scene is absolutely exploding with film festivals happening across India and globally. Forget Netflix and chill (for a weekend, anyway!).

unnormalised: Word on the street is the Dharamshala International Film Festival (DIFF) is gearing up for another cracking year. Always showcasing indie gems you won’t find anywhere else!
normalised: Word on the street is the Dharamshala International Film Festival (D I F F) is gearing up for another cracking year. Always showcasing indie gems you won’t find anywhere else!

unnormalised: And guess what? Busan International Film Festival just wrapped up, with some fantastic Indian short films making waves. Big congrats to all the desi filmmakers!
normalised: And guess what? Busan International Film Festival just wrapped up, with some fantastic Indian short films making waves. Big congrats to all the desi filmmakers!

unnormalised: Thinking of attending? Pro tip: pack light, carry a power bank, and definitely try the local biryani – festival food is half the fun!
normalised: Thinking of attending? Pro tip: pack light, carry a power bank, and definitely try the local biryani – festival food is half the fun!

unnormalised: Don't forget the IFFI Goa coming up later this year. We're expecting it to be a grand affair with many Bollywood stars and international guests.
normalised: Don't forget the I F F I Goa coming up later this year. We're expecting it to be a grand affair with many Bollywood stars and international guests.

unnormalised: Plus, Onam celebrations are still in the air, so keep an eye out for film screenings related to the beautiful state of Kerala and its rich culture.
normalised: Plus, Onam celebrations are still in the air, so keep an eye out for film screenings related to the beautiful state of Kerala and its rich culture.

unnormalised: It's festival season, y'all. Time to get your cinephile on!
normalised: It's festival season, y'all. Time to get your cinephile on!
